metadata.name: Lady in Red
metadata.description:
Toni Payne  
Lady in Red, 2022  
Digital Photograph


-  
stop and see me. listen and hear me. lest our love be dead. embrace the lady in red. 




---  
There is only 1 NFT of this Artwork. 
This artwork is also available as a limited edition run Physical Print. (Not included with NFT)
